Model: ExperimentÂ¶

In the Model folder we have a special set of methods, group under the wide name: Experiment. In this folder we have new classes that are specifically written to perform a complex experiment.

Every time we have to run an automatic experiment we write the class that contains all the methods needed to set it up, run and save the obtained data.
